keyword: how many calories in a mozzarella cheese stick
title: How Many Calories in a Mozzarella Cheese Stick?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a mozzarella cheese stick, including protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition breakdown per serving.
h1: How Many Calories in a Mozzarella Cheese Stick?
assumptions: Standard string cheese stick (~28 g), made from whole milk mozzarella, no added flavors or coatings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, milk type, size, and processing; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A mozzarella cheese stick provides about 80 kcal and 6 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in one mozzarella cheese stick?
faqs.a: Approximately 80 kcal for a standard 28 g stick.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in a mozzarella cheese stick?
faqs.a: About 6 g of protein per stick.

faqs.q: Are mozzarella cheese sticks high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 6 g total fat, including 4 g saturated fat per stick.

faqs.q: Do mozzarella cheese sticks have carbs?
faqs.a: Very lowâ€”only about 1 g carbs and 0 g fiber per stick.

faqs.q: How does brand affect calories in mozzarella cheese sticks?
faqs.a: Brands vary; low-moisture or flavored sticks may add 10-20 kcal.
